originalText.text: JOIN AT YOUR OWN RISK!!! They do not care about employees, very rude workers, unorganized company in GENERAL! They will try to play with you, your time & your money! The whole entire company needs to go down! The company is as if it’s ran by children, like I said join at your own risk!!!!!!

originalText.text:
Went 3 times for interview. They ask me to come to work on the trains stations they were in need of Spanish speaking personal At the end they sold out the communities they were supposed to protect and represent. To ALLIED. They may be the biggest. But big doesn't mean BETTER. Its sad what couple million dollars. Will do to a group of women that i was eagle to call friends. And bosses and i was standing to growth whit them.
You let us down.
Enjoy your $$$$$$$.
ERNESTO.

originalText.text: My experience with city safe has taken me to a long journey meeting. Good workers, good candidates along the way. As we have been partners with MTA providing them security services for the stations. We have learn to an end.  On the contract so I hope that we have the opportunity to. Whoever company takes over will be able to have an opportunity to transitioval. And I have the opportunity to continue providing services. No matter who we are with and providing the security services for MT AI am grateful that I was chosen as a candidate with city safe partner.  I am still with them.

originalText.text: Excellent place to work.  The team is experienced in the security industry.  They go over and beyond to ensure they have the right people for the right job to exceed client expectations.  They are truly driven by their Core Values!  Great place to further your security career.

originalText.text: The worst company ever they are very unprofessional they don’t know how to talk to people it not my fault that the company can’t do there job right and do right by the employee it not my fault ya lose contract
